channel.title: GTA Chinatown Wars
channel.description: This is a good game. You can get wicked guns, good cars, and pull of drug raids. It has a gripping storyline, and i would recommend this game to ANYONE (well, anyone under 18 has to get someone to buy it for them :mad:)

item.title: GTA Chinatown Wars
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:17, topic:268672”]Actually, it’s called Margaritaville.

http://www.southparkstudios.com/guide/1303/?

When cartman plays Judas for the game and Stan is trying to return the Margaritaville machine. :)[/quote]

Cheers ron!

I might get this game on the ds…

item.title: GTA Chinatown Wars
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:13, topic:268672”]Harvest Moon?

Which one? DS? Or Island of Happiness?

Haven’t played DS. It seems like a MUCH bigger version of Mineral Town which I kinda don’t feel like learning ATM.

IoH. It’s pretty good. Different than the others, but I still like it.[/quote]
The controls are terrible though, i heard you control it by using the stylus all the time.

item.title: GTA Chinatown Wars
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:10, topic:268672”]Because you left it on they are in that extension?

What the hell lol.

Never heard of that.

Though I was pissed. My save game for Harvest Moon got corrupted somehow. Thank god I back up the whole thing once a week or so.

But it gave me a good excuse to give Pokemon Platinum a whirl.[/quote]

I’ve got it, but i haven’t played it yet.
Is it any good?

item.title: GTA Chinatown Wars
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Because you left it on they are in that extension?

What the hell lol.

Never heard of that.

Though I was pissed. My save game for Harvest Moon got corrupted somehow. Thank god I back up the whole thing once a week or so.

But it gave me a good excuse to give Pokemon Platinum a whirl.

Read full topic

item.title: GTA Chinatown Wars
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:7, topic:268672”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=354538.msg2722602#msg2722602 date=1238097512]

(well, anyone under 18 has to get someone to buy it for them :mad:)

cough backup cartcough

What?
[/quote]

Any type of cartridge that you can put a type of DS loader thingy on and put either homebrew applications or games, wi-fi applications, or just ROMs.

Basically you download a ROM of the game, put it on the cartridge, plug it into the DS, play the game.[/quote]

Yeah.
I got one. STH or sttp, can you guys help?
I left my DS on and charging for 3 days… And now 113 of my ROMS are in a .arp extension, so i only have 11 playable games…
Should i just rename them?

Read full topic

item.title: GTA Chinatown Wars
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:6, topic:268672”][quote author=sppt link=topic=354538.msg2721647#msg2721647 date=1238021232]

(well, anyone under 18 has to get someone to buy it for them :mad:)

cough backup cartcough
[/quote]

What?[/quote]

Any type of cartridge that you can put a type of DS loader thingy on and put either homebrew applications or games, wi-fi applications, or just ROMs.

Basically you download a ROM of the game, put it on the cartridge, plug it into the DS, play the game.

Read full topic
